Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

        Returns:

        disabled - set to disabled?

        time - Time (hour only) to change to

        Returns:

      • isNextAlarmTomorrow

        public static boolean isNextAlarmTomorrow(int nextAlarmHour,
                          int hourNow)
        Checks if the next alarm is tomorrow or today.
        Parameters:
        nextAlarmHour - hour the next alarm will happen at
        hourNow - current hour
        Returns:
        true, if the alarm is tomorrow
